title: Galleria Configuration
description: Configuration for Galleria gallery generator - designed for extraction as standalone package

manifest_path.description: Path to NormPic manifest JSON file

thumbnail_size.description: Size of generated thumbnails in pixels (square)

photos_per_page.description: Number of photos per gallery page

theme_path.description: Path to theme directory containing templates

THEME_TEMPLATES_OVERRIDES.description: Path to shared theme directory for cross-system components

parallel.description: Enable parallel thumbnail processing using multiple CPU cores

max_workers.description: Maximum number of worker processes for parallel processing (defaults to CPU count)
